revised_title: Edgar Douglas Adrian, Baron Adrian of Cambridge: A Biographical Memoir
scientific_discipline: Biographies and Book Reviews > Science History
tldr: This biographical memoir recounts the life and achievements of Edgar Douglas Adrian, Baron Adrian of Cambridge, a prominent British physiologist. Born into a family of civil servants, Adrian pursued a successful academic career, studying at Trinity College, Cambridge, and making significant contributions to the field of physiology. The memoir highlights his ancestry, education, and personal life, as well as his impact on the Royal Society and the broader scientific community.
